title: During the late 1960s, I became acquainted with former Olympian Adam Smith (swimmer).  He resided at 4916 Oleander Drive and was retired from the Wilmington YMCA.  Once on a visit to his home, he showed me his medals.  Can the Star-News do a story on Mr. Smithäó»s 1924 Summer Olympic involvement?
